title: Portfolio Showcase
desc: This project is a personal portfolio website showcasing web development skills, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and project display with filters.

title: To-Do List
desc: A web-based task management tool with task creation, editing, completion tracking, and filtering options. Developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with local storage for data persistence.

title: Trivia Challenge
desc: Quick Quiz is a dynamic web app for testing knowledge. It features timed quizzes, score tracking, and a competitive leaderboard, making learning engaging and fun.

title: Food Menu Master
desc: Menu App is a React-based, responsive food menu display with category filters, highlighting strong skills in React components and Sass CSS.

title: Weather Tracker
desc: Utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this web app offers real-time weather data from OpenWeather API. It delivers temperature, humidity, wind speed, and weather icons.

title: Digital Canvas
desc: Developed a browser painting tool using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling users to create digital art with features like shape selection and undo/redo functions.

title: TinDog Project
desc: TinDog is a chic web app for dog lovers to connect with nearby dog owners, featuring responsive design using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and engaging animations.

title: Recipe Blog Website
desc: This responsive recipe blog site features a variety of recipes, an 'About Me' section, and recent posts. Developed with HTML and CSS, it prioritizes user experience on diverse devices.

title: Image Search
desc: Explore images effortlessly using this web app, powered by the Unsplash API. It combines responsive design with skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and API integration.

title: Uber Clone
desc: This is a Uber clone Website made using HTML and CSS only. It is responsive and visually appealing webpage for Uber, showcasing its services, safety features, and easy app downloads.

title: React Calculator
desc: Developed a responsive calculator using React, featuring real-time arithmetic operations. Demonstrates proficiency in React, JavaScript, and CSS grid layout design.

title: Flexbox Layout
desc: This project showcases a responsive website layout using HTML and CSS. It features a stylish design with flexible columns, adapting seamlessly to various screen sizes for an optimal user experience.

title: Calculator
desc: A responsive web calculator allowing basic arithmetic operations via keyboard or on-screen buttons. Developed using HTML, CSS for responsiveness, JavaScript for events, and DOM manipulation.

title: Random Password Generator
desc: A web app that creates and copies strong passwords. Developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery for easy password generation and clipboard functionality.

title: Timekeeper
desc: A versatile web application featuring a clock with live time, a countdown timer, and a stopwatch. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with dynamic UI animations.

title: Musical Instruments
desc: Interactive drum kit and piano project with mouse/keyboard inputs, animations, and responsive design. Created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Simon Game
desc: Classic memory game: HTML, CSS, jQuery, audio, local storage, and responsive design. Offers dynamic levels, scoring, and a responsive layout.

title: Task Manager
desc: Task Manager, a React-based to-do list. Users can add, complete, and delete tasks. Demonstrates React skills, state management, UI design, and CSS.

title: Slide Show Wizard
desc: The Slider: A React image slider app with smooth transitions and auto-sliding. Demonstrates React, CSS styling, and dynamic content with state management.

title: Tabbed Content
desc: Built a dynamic React job timeline for easy navigation, highlighting React, state management, and JSON data handling skills.

title: User Reviews
desc: Developed a dynamic React job timeline for job details navigation, featuring React, state management, and JSON data handling skills.

title: Tour Explorer
desc: A React-based Tours App displaying tours with removal and refresh options. Demonstrates React state management and dynamic UI updates.

title: Basic Calculator
desc: Created a React calculator web app with a user-friendly interface, emphasizing React, JavaScript, and responsive web development skills for essential functions.

title: Accordion Magic
desc: React app featuring an interactive FAQ section. Users can expand/collapse questions for answers. This project highlights my skills in React, JavaScript, CSS, SCSS, JSON data integration.

title: Text Generator
desc: Cool React app generates custom lorem ipsum paragraphs for dynamic content generation. This project highlights my skills in React, state management, form handling, and responsive design.
